metadata.title: CVE-2020-28023 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Out-of-bounds Read. smtp_setup_msg may disclose sensitive information from process memory to an unauthenticated SMTP client.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-28023` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-base - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-config - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-daemon-light - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
eximon4 - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.note: leosilva> trusty/xenial ESM not-affected code not present

criterions.comment: exim4 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.94-15ubuntu1.2').
